LanguageData.JRWIndoraptor.label: Indoraptor
LanguageData.JRWIndoraptor.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #???-??? [INDORAPTOR]
THE INDOMITABLE THIEF
Posessing amazing intelligent capabilities and the ability to process and follow orders, the Indoraptor was built to be the ultimate machine in combat. Their razor sharp claws allow them slice through skin and bone, their jaws boasting incredible strength, as well as the ability to echolocate. The Indominus genome was supposedly lost during the 2018 incident at Lockewood manor, but determined genome replicators brought it back from extinction. Unlike the prototype, these specimens possess empathy. As long as they're on your side.
LanguageData.JRWIndoraptor.tools.left_claw.label: left claw
LanguageData.JRWIndoraptor.tools.right_claw.label: right claw
